headline: Is Dollar General (DG) Still Attractive After A 106.3% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Dollar General is still good value after a strong run, this article walks through what the current price may be implying and how that stacks up against several valuation checks. The stock trades at US$143.43 after a 4.8% gain over the last month, with a 106.3% return over the past year and longer term 3 year and 5 year returns of 33.2% and 20.0% declines respectively. This may leave you questioning whether the recent recovery has gone too far or has more room to...
